profile.title: DEVOPS EXPERT ROLE
profile.summary: Implements processes and tools to successfully deploy DevOps techniques across the entire solution development lifecycle.
profile.mission: Applies a cross-functional, collaborative approach for the creation of customer-centric software solutions. Introduces automation throughout the software production system to deliver better software faster.
